Answer: Check that you are hydrated, take a brief mental break, adjust clothing so you are warm but not sweating, and wash or sanitize your hands.

Question: When I wake frequently at night during a cold, what can I do in the next 10 minutes?

Question: When I am sweating after being bundled up outside, what can I do in the next 10 minutes?

Question: When my child brings home every new virus, what can I do in the next 10 minutes?
